description: Was expecting to like this more, but after playing a few games, would rather play Terra Mystica or Gaia Project. It is still a very solid game I would play anytime. The solo game is less desirable.Update: I am liking it the more I play it.

A well rounded Euro. I enjoyed the experience, but I didn't feel like it really did much to stand out from every other one. The theme is compelling, but it felt loosely coupled to the mechanics. Ultimately, I think this game will blur together in my memory with every other game in this category.Update: I've played this a lot recently and am bumping it up to an 8. I still agree with most of my assessment above, but I've still been really enjoying it. I think the unique clan powers make it particularly fun - they really vary the experience greatly.

title: What a gre...
description: What a great area control game. Everything feels organic, there are PLENTY of decisions to be made that could affect gameplay, it is really deep and yet not complex. It is a joy to play with 2 players also.

title: Weight: 3....
description: Weight: 3.39 / 5Includes wooden insert

title: KS-edition...
description: KS-edition. Have played the game once (solo), which was quite alright. Would like to try this with more players. The box is quite a bit smaller then I had imagined and so are the components. Not a big problem, but some components are very small for my big fingers Have also played with 2 and 3 players and it is an interesting game which I would like to play some more. Unfortunately, the Cult of the New combined with a handful of campaign/legacy games makes that there are always other games that have my attention.....

title: Kickstarte...
description: Kickstarter edition

title: Indeed, be...
description: Indeed, better than Terra Mystica. Awfully similar, but cleaner in terms of rules and offers slightly more player interaction. Rather dry, but reasonably pleasant.

title: Solid Euro...
description:
Solid Euro game that doesn't take a long time. I've only played solo so far, but I enjoyed it and want to play more. This is a game I'm excited to introduce to new people.

I like very heavy games so this feels mid-heavy to me. It'd be a great game to play at the end of the evening when everyone is tired but still wants something interesting.

title: A streamli...
description: A streamlined version of Terra Mystica: lighter and faster.

title: Germany
description: Germany

title: An engagin...
description: An engaging, solid economic game with some very interesting choices. The variety of clans and their unique abilities ensures everyone's strategy is largely different. I pulled out a shocking win in my first game by virtue of Clan Buchanan's ability to get more contracts, making up for my game-long deficit in Glory Points with huge bonuses for goods shipped. Plenty of variability in setup means lots of replayability. This one deserves the hype it's getting. My only drawbacks: Some of the strategies and scoring are kind of difficult to grasp without more plays, so you won't really get to appreciate this game fully until you have it to the table several times.

Brain burning engine builder with unique player abilities. Prone to analysis paralysis, unfortunately. Great use of a market and tough decisions. Good player interaction.

title: Being of S...
description: Being of Scottish heritage, any new game set in that setting catches my eye.  One with decent art and interesting game play jumps to the top of my list to at least try.  Having done just that did not drop this off my list to acquire.  If anything it galvanized my desire to own the game.

title: KS backed ...
description:
KS backed 28/4
Received 4/11
First game in - 2 player & lots of ways to score.
Second game - 4 player - did really badly and took quite a lot to explain rules.
3rd game in and really starting to see how the different elements interact and enjoying this.

title: Includes M...
description: Includes Meeple Realty insert.

title: An enjoyab...
description:
An enjoyable, engaging game with high quality components and lots to think about. The different mechanisms: buildings, maps, contracts, market all work together quite seamlessly.

The production quality is lovely: all the different wooden bits are completely adorable and fun.

title: Kickstarte...
description: Kickstarter basic edition.

title: Not as goo...
description: Not as good as I thought it would be. All of the different boards and pieces make the game pretty fiddly. Most of the actions aren't that interesting. Interaction is minimal and at the end I don't feel like I've accomplished anything.

title: smooth, ba...
description: smooth, balanced, lots of paths to victory

(11/17) 8. A very cool game that blends elements of Terra Mystica with a dash of Marco Polo.  A really cool game that I'm looking forward to playing again for a couple reasons.  1) Because it was really need and deep but also B) because there was some suspicion at the table that my power (that of being able to have a second contract) might be OP?  Interested to try playing with another clan.
